sourcesContent:
// 主页 import React, {useState } from 'react' import '../../assets/css/homepage.css' import iphone from '../../assets/images/iphone.png' import electricity from '../../assets/images/电量.png' import wifi from '../../assets/images/wifi.png' import search from '../../assets/images/搜索.png' import brightness from '../../assets/images/控制.png' import launchpad from '../../assets/images/launchpad.png' import bear from '../../assets/images/bear.png' import vscode from '../../assets/images/vscode.png' import facetime from '../../assets/images/facetime.png' import safari from '../../assets/images/safari.png' import terminal from '../../assets/images/terminal.png' import mail from '../../assets/images/mail.png' import github from '../../assets/images/github.png' function Lockscreen(props) { const [click, setClick] = useState('false') const [display, setDisplay] = useState('none') const OpenPopUpWindowIphone = (e) => { // console.log(e.currentTarget); let target = e.currentTarget //获取到当前触发事件的对象 // console.log(target.getAttribute('click')); let targetclick = target.getAttribute('click') if (targetclick==='false') { setClick('true') setDisplay('block') // console.log('已打开弹窗') } else { setClick('false') setDisplay('none') // console.log('已关闭弹窗') } } const OpenPopUpWindowWifi = (e) => { e.preventDefault() if (click==='false') { setClick('true') setDisplay('block') // console.log('已打开弹窗') } else { setClick('false') setDisplay('none') // console.log('已关闭弹窗') } } const ReturnLockScreen = () => { props.history.push('/') } // 获取当前时间 var myDate = new Date() // let year = myDate.getFullYear() //获取当前年份 // let month = myDate.getMonth() //获取当前月份 // let date = myDate.getDate() //获取当前日 // let day = myDate.getDay() //获取当前星期 // let hour = myDate.getHours() //获取当前小时 // let minute = myDate.getMinutes() //获取当前分钟 let mytime = myDate.toLocaleString(); //获取当前时间 console.log(mytime); // setInterval(function () { // setTime(myDate.toLocaleString()) // },1000) return (
{OpenPopUpWindowIphone(e)}} click={click} >
Bear
{/*点击iPhone弹窗 */}
  • About This Mac
  • System Preferences...
  • App Store...
  • Recent Items
  • Force Quit...
  • Sleep
  • Restart...
  • Shut Down...
  • {ReturnLockScreen()}}>Lock Screen
  • {ReturnLockScreen()}}>Log Out Mengmeng He...
100%
{OpenPopUpWindowWifi(e)}} >
{/* 点击WiFi弹窗 */}
Wi-Fi
图标
{mytime } {/* Thu May 20 9:35 PM */}
) } export default Lockscreen
